root.name: Zenonia 4
root.description: OverviewZenonia 4 is an RPG game developed and published by Gamevil Inc. for the iPhone and iPad platforms.CompatibilityZenonia 4 will only run on a supported iOS device that is running iOS version 4.0 or later. The list of compatible devices is:iPhone 3GSiPhone 4iPhone 4SiPod Touch 3rd GenerationiPod Touch 4th GenerationiPad
